title: Calvary
content: The name by which the KJV (
) denotes the place where our Lord was crucified.
is merely an English form of the Latin word
which is itself a translation of the Hebrew word
“a skull.” The popular expression “Mount Calvary” is not warranted by any statement in the Gospels. There is no mention of a mount in any of the narratives of the Crucifixion. See
